Air Pistol.name: エアーピストル
Air Pistol.description: An Exotic Medium Pistol. Fires Paintballs. If loaded with acid it is able to ablate armor by one with each hit. Refer to the full item description on pg. 347.

Assault Rifle (Excellent).name: アサルトライフル (高品質)
Assault Rifle (Excellent).dvTable: DV アサルトライフル

Assault Rifle (Poor).name: アサルトライフル(低品質)
Assault Rifle (Poor).description: A standard-issue assault rifle. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.
Assault Rifle (Poor).dvTable: DV アサルトライフル

Assault Rifle.name: アサルト・ライフル
Assault Rifle.dvTable: DV アサルトライフル

Baseball Bat (Excellent).name: 野球バット (高品質)
Baseball Bat (Excellent).description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. +1 to Attack.

Baseball Bat (Poor).name: 野球バット (低品質)
Baseball Bat (Poor).description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Baseball Bat.name: 野球バット
Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies.

Bow (Excellent).name: 弓 (高品質)
Bow (Excellent).description:
An excellent quality bow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

+1 to Attack check.

Bow (Poor).name: 弓 (低品質)
Bow (Poor).description:
A poor quality bow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the weapon jams and requires using an action to clear.

Bow.name: 弓
Bow.description: A revitalized bow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

Chainsaw (Excellent).name: チェーンソー (高品質)
Chainsaw (Excellent).description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank. +1 to Attack.

Chainsaw (Poor).name: チェーンソー (低品質)
Chainsaw (Poor).description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Chainsaw.name: チェーンソー
Chainsaw.description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank.

Combat Knife (Excellent).name: コンバットナイフ (高品質)
Combat Knife (Excellent).description: A knife fit for the streets. +1 to Attack.

Combat Knife (Poor).name: コンバットナイフ(低品質)
Combat Knife (Poor).description: A knife fit for the streets. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Constitutional Arms Hurricane Assault We.name: Constitutional Arms Hurricane Assault Weapon
Constitutional Arms Hurricane Assault We.description: An Exotic Shotgun with 2 ROF. Cannot make aimed shots and needs BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted).

Crossbow (Excellent).name: クロスボウ (高品質)
Crossbow (Excellent).description:
An excellent quality crossbow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

+1 to Attack check.

Crossbow (Poor).name: クロスボウ(低品質)
Crossbow (Poor).description:
A poor quality crossbow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the weapon jams and requires using an action to clear.

Crossbow.name: クロスボウ
Crossbow.description: A standard crossbow, reloaded as part of an Attack action.

Crowbar (Excellent).name: バール (高品質)
Crowbar (Excellent).description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends. +1 to Attack.

Crowbar (Poor).name: バール(低品質)
Crowbar (Poor).description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends.

Dartgun.name: ダーツガン
Dartgun.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Flamethrower.name: フレイムスロワー
Flamethrower.description: An Exotic Shotgun that uses the Heavy Weapons Skill. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Grenade Launcher (Excellent).name: グレネードランチャー (高品質)
Grenade Launcher (Excellent).description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. +1 to Attack.
Grenade Launcher (Excellent).dvTable: DV グレネードランチャー

Grenade Launcher (Poor).name: グレネード・ランチャー(低品質)

Heavy Pistol (Poor).description: A concealable, heavy pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Heavy SMG (Excellent).name: 大型SMG (高品質)
Heavy SMG (Excellent).description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

Heavy SMG (Poor).name: 大型SMG (低品質)
Heavy SMG (Poor).description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Heavy SMG.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed.

Helicopter Blades (Excellent).name: ヘリコプターの回転翼(高品質)
Helicopter Blades (Excellent).description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily. +1 to Attack.

Helicopter Blades (Poor).name: ヘリコプターの回転翼(低品質)
Helicopter Blades (Poor).description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Helicopter Blades.name: ヘリコプターの回転翼
Helicopter Blades.description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily.

Kendachi Mono-Three.name: Kendachi Mono-Three
Kendachi Mono-Three.description: An Exotic, Excellent Quality, Two-Handed Very Heavy Melee Weapon. It appears as a high-tech katana, able to ignore any armor below SP11.

Lead Pipe (Excellent).name: 鉄パイプ(高品質)
Lead Pipe (Excellent).description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once. +1 to Attack.

Lead Pipe (Poor).name: 鉄パイプ(低品質)
Lead Pipe (Poor).description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Lead Pipe.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once.

+1 to Attack.

Light Melee (Poor).description:
Generic Poor Quality Light Melee weapon.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Machete (Excellent).name: 鉈(高品質)
Machete (Excellent).description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City. +1 to Attack.

Machete (Poor).name: 鉈(低品質)
Machete (Poor).description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Malorian Arms 3516.name: マロリアン・アームズ3516
Malorian Arms 3516.description:
An Exotic, Excellent Quality Very Heavy Pistol. Comes with a Smartgun Link* that must be used. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

*Must be manually added after acquiring the weapon

Medium Melee (Excellent).name: 中型近接武器 (高品質)
Medium Melee (Excellent).description:
Generic Excellent Quality Medium Melee Weapon.

+1 to Attack.

Medium Melee (Poor).name: 中型近接武器 (低品質)
Medium Melee (Poor).description:
Generic Poor Quality Medium Melee Weapon.

If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Medium Pistol (Poor).name: 中型拳銃(低品質)
Medium Pistol (Poor).description: A concealable, medium-sized pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Microwaver.name: マイクロウェーバー
Microwaver.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Causes cyberware or electrical components to be rendered inoperable for a minute unless the target passes a DV15 Cybertech Check. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Militech \"Cowboy\" U-56 Grenade Launche.name: Militech "Cowboy" U-56 Grenade Launcher
Militech \"Cowboy\" U-56 Grenade Launche.description: An Exotic Grenade Launcher with 2 ROF. Holds four grenades. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted).

Naginata (Excellent).name: 薙刀(高品質)
Naginata (Excellent).description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements. +1 to Attack.

Naginata (Poor).name: 薙刀(低品質)
Naginata (Poor).description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Naginata.name: 薙刀
Naginata.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements.

Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun.name: Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun
Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun.description:
An Exotic Assault Rifle. It cannot make Aimed or Autofire Shots. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Ignores any armor below SP11*.

*Not currently supported to will need to manually apply damage to armoured targets

Rocket Launcher (Excellent).name: ロケットランチャー (高品質)
Rocket Launcher (Excellent).description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. +1 to Attack.
Rocket Launcher (Excellent).dvTable: DV ロケットランチャー

Shrieker.name: シュリーカー
Shrieker.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Requires ear protection to prevent Damaged Ear critical injuries. The target must beat a DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs Check or suffer the Damaged Ear critical injury. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Sledgehammer (Excellent).name: スレッジハンマー (高品質)
Sledgehammer (Excellent).description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area. +1 to Attack.

Sledgehammer (Poor).name: スレッジハンマー(低品質)
Sledgehammer (Poor).description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Sledgehammer.description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area.

SMG (Poor).name: SMG (低品質)
SMG (Poor).description: A concealable SMG. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Sniper Rifle (Excellent).name: スナイパーライフル (高品質)
Sniper Rifle (Excellent).description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. +1 to Attack.
Sniper Rifle (Excellent).dvTable: DV スナイパーライフル

Sniper Rifle (Poor).name: スナイパーライフル(低品質)

Spiked Bat (Excellent).name: 釘バット (高品質)
Spiked Bat (Excellent).description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip. +1 to Attack.

Spiked Bat (Poor).name: 釘バット(低品質)
Spiked Bat (Poor).description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Spiked Bat.name: 釘バット
Spiked Bat.description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip.

Stun Baton.name: スタンバトン
Stun Baton.description: An Exotic, One-handed Medium Melee Weapon. Target is knocked unconscious if damage dealt would reduce them to under 1 HP. Doesn't cause Critical Injuries or ablate armor. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Stun Gun.name: スタンガン
Stun Gun.description: An Exotic Heavy Pistol. Target is knocked unconscious if damage dealt would reduce them to under 1 HP. Doesn't cause Critical Injuries or ablate armor. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Sword (Excellent).name: 剣 (高品質)
Sword (Excellent).description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting. +1 to Attack.

Sword (Poor).name: 剣(低品質)
Sword (Poor).description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Sword.name: 剣
Sword.description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting.

Thrown Weapon.name: 投擲武器
Thrown Weapon.description: A basic lob or pitch of an object. Use an Action to make a Ranged Attack at up to 25m/yds. Targets can choose to Dodge your throw if they can Dodge bullets. Melee weapons deal their base damage, but don't penetrate half SP.

Tomahawk (Excellent).name: トマホーク (高品質)
Tomahawk (Excellent).description: A light axe that can be thrown. +1 to Attack.

Tomahawk (Poor).name: トマホーク(低品質)
Tomahawk (Poor).description: A light axe that can be thrown. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Tomahawk.name: トマホーク
Tomahawk.description: A light axe that can be thrown.

Tsunami Arms Helix.name: Tsunami Arms Helix
Tsunami Arms Helix.description: An Exotic Assault Rifle that uses only Autofire. Holds 40 bullets, using 20 bullets with each attack. Uses Autofire rules with a multiplication up to a maximum of 5. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted).

Unarmed.name: 素手
Unarmed.description: Throwing hands, does not ignore half armor.

Very Heavy Melee (Excellent).description:
